urls.title: Complaints and compliments | Customer Service | SWISS
urls.description: SWISS greatly values good service and high standards of quality. If we ever fail to meet your expectations please inform us accordingly.

data.text: @MeenaVe91254288 Hi, Iam truly sorry to learn of the circumstances surrounding your experience with us thus far and I sincerely apologize. Please note that you are requested to contact the Lost and found desk of your arrival airport for more updated information regarding your baggage.
